Works perfectly :) just remember to follow the instructions, on how to change the game language

does it need origin
to play

My PC specs are: Intel corei3 2100,win7 64 bit, AMD Radeon HD 6770, AMD catalyst 12.1 without caps, native resolution of monitor:1360X768. I am not getting in game resolution option more than 1280X720 in 16:9
which program should i use for opening Environment.cfg
Not many seeders (as of when I got this) but suprisingly quick download. Started it before I went to sleep, was done in the morning.

You can change the language in the cfg file with notepad. Select open, choose from list of installed programs, notepad. Search the file for language, you'll see it there. Just delete Rus and add Eng in its place. Enjoy!
